talk.author: did:plc:bhlrau56litmv6cb2t4dd7st
talk.utter:
Violating people's rights because there is some characteristic about them you personally do not like is not likely going to achieve what you think it will.

Because that very same thing can be done to you, once a majority decides that you may have certain traits they find undesirable.

talk.author: did:plc:bzcqosvjxeavat6x643ugt62
talk.utter: It already is being done. Bad people don't wait for precedent. The only thing we can hope for now is to take some of that power back for individuals, because they essentially have none now.

talk.author: did:plc:bhlrau56litmv6cb2t4dd7st
talk.utter:
This reminds me of one of my favorite quotes, 

“Beware that, when fighting monsters, you yourself do not become a monster... for when you gaze long into the abyss. The abyss gazes also into you.”

talk.utter: I'll stick to punching Nazis, thx. And will keep trying to do so until I slip into the abyss.
